step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
Try to keep your elbows closer together as you bring your hands up towards your forehead.
Excellent! You're spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright.
Great job holding the stretch. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Nicely done reversing the motion. Return to the starting position smoothly.
Second rep starting well. Hands clasped in your lap, ready to move.
Good effort bringing your hands up. Focus on keeping those elbows in close to your head.
You're doing great spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Maintain good posture.
Holding the stretch effectively. Keep your head steady and avoid any forward strain.
Excellent return to the start. You've completed both repetitions of the Clasp and Spread exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close to your head when bringing your hands up and spread them wide behind your head. Maintain an upright posture throughout.
